alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 4:58PM CDT until May 02 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Sebastian County in west central Arkansas... East central Le Flore County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 458 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wister, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Poteau... Heavener... Wister... Hackett... Howe... Hartford... Huntington... Bonanza... Midland... Cameron... Heavener Runestone State Park... Lake Wister State Park... Excelsior... Jenny Lind... Rock Island... Patterson... Arkola... Witcherville... Dayton... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tulsa.
